response.overview: If given the choice, I would prefer to live a peaceful and content life in a community rather than participating in protests. The crucial battles would involve the defenders of the sea, who rise up to protect their way of life from being destroyed.  If the community undergoes changes due to development projects, and if the sea becomes inaccessible for fishing as it used to be, and if there is a scarcity of fish, crab, and seafood, what would the situation be like?  However, this battle would undergo a profound transformation as the local residents determine the development plans themselves, adapting to the needs of the community. The coastal inhabitants would face these challenges under the influence of worries, hopes, dreams, and the vision of the future.  Take everyone on a journey to experience the life of the defenders of the sea, who strive to preserve their way of life, culture, beliefs, food, resources, air, and the sea.
response.title: Sarong Warrior
